articles.description: I created an experimental chatbot with 50 of my WIRED articles. Try it out for yourself.
articles.content: I was never afraid to train an AI chatbot on my writing, because OpenAI had already broken the seal. CEO Sam Altman announced the GPT feature at OpenAIs first developer day in November, prior to the … [+2896 chars]
